content: Hello James Smith, thank you for coming to see my apartment. I am very happy to hear that you are interested in renting it. Based on the size of the apartment, which is 25 square meters, I would like to propose a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This price takes into account the current market rates in the area and the fact that I am a landlord who wants to maximize my gains. However, I am open to discussing the rental price further if you have any concerns or counteroffers.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
